All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddItemActivity
Activity for adding a new item to the inventory.
Database
Provides a singleton structure for accessing the TagDatabase within the application.
DatabaseHandler
 
EditItemActivity
Activity for editing an existing item.
EditItemActivityTest
 
EditTagsActivity
Activity for editing tags associated with an item.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Item
Represents an item with various properties such as name, price, tags, and more.
ItemHandler
Handles operations related to items such as adding, deleting, and retrieving items from the database.
ItemHolder
 
ItemListAdapter
 
MainActivity
The main activity that starts when the application is launched.
NewUserActivity
The new user activity that starts when the application is launched for the first time.
Tag
Represents a tag that can be associated with an item.
TagDatabase
Manages the operations related to Tag storage and retrieval in Firestore.
TagHolder
ViewHolder for a tag item in a RecyclerView, used in TagsListAdapter.
TagsListAdapter
Adapter for providing views that represent items in a data set of tags.
User
Represents a user with a name property.
UserActivity
Represents an activity for user interactions within the app.
UserDatabase
